statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002' AND interaction_type = 'query';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM interaction_date)) AS average_interaction_time FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('purchase', 'query');
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type='purchase' OR interaction_type='complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM interaction_date) = 12;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type!='complaint' GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT AVG(interaction_notes) FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT MAX(interaction_date), MIN(interaction_date) FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_notes LIKE '%important%'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_notes NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Purchase', 'Support')
SELECT AVG(interaction_date) FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date < '2022-02-01'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT MIN(interaction_date) FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_notes LIKE '%great%'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date <= '2022-01-31' AND interaction_notes IS NULL
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND interaction_notes LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date LIMIT 10
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date FROM Customer_Communications;
SELECT customer_id, communication_type, communication_content FROM Customer_Communications;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions INNER JOIN Customer_Communications ON Customer_Interactions.customer_id = Customer_Communications.customer_id;
SELECT ci.customer_id, cc.communication_content FROM Customer_Interactions ci INNER JOIN Customer_Communications cc ON ci.customer_id = cc.customer_id;

SELECT ci.customer_id, COUNT(cc.communication_id) AS total_communications FROM Customer_Interactions ci INNER JOIN Customer_Communications cc ON ci.customer_id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY ci.customer_id;

SELECT ci.customer_id, MAX(cc.communication_date) AS last_communication_date FROM Customer_Interactions ci INNER JOIN Customer_Communications cc ON ci.customer_id = cc.customer_id GROUP BY ci.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', NOW()::DATE - interaction_date::DATE)) AS avg_days_between_interactions FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT CAST(AVG(DATE_PART('day', NOW()::DATE - interaction_date::DATE)) AS INTEGER) AS avg_days_between_interactions FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT communication_type, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM Customer_Communications GROUP BY communication_type;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%complaint%';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_id = 10;
SELECT communication_content FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications WHERE customer_id = 5 AND communication_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT communication_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_content LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions INNER JOIN Customer_Communications ON Customer_Interactions.customer_id = Customer_Communications.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions LEFT JOIN Customer_Communications ON Customer_Interactions.customer_id = Customer_Communications.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications RIGHT JOIN Customer_Interactions ON Customer_Communications.customer_id = Customer_Interactions.customer_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT communication_type, AVG(LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM Customer_Communications GROUP BY communication_type;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Communications);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Communications WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Interactions);
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Communications WHERE communication_type = 'SMS' LIMIT 1);
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_type ASC;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM Customer_Communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM Customer_Interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM communications;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM communications;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM communications WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM communications ORDER BY communication_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM communications LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers OFFSET 5;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions OFFSET 10;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type FROM communications OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT A.customer_name, B.interaction_date FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id;
SELECT A.customer_name, C.communication_date FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id JOIN communications C ON B.interaction_id = C.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting');
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_type;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE interaction_type IN ('Call', 'Email') ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_type;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(interaction_date) - MIN(interaction_date) AS interaction_duration FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT A.customer_name, B.interaction_date FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE MONTH(B.interaction_date) = 4;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS communication_count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id JOIN communications C ON B.interaction_id = C.interaction_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, communication_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(C.communication_date, B.interaction_date)) AS communication_response_time FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id JOIN communications C ON B.interaction_id = C.interaction_id GROUP BY customer_name, communication_type;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%positive%' GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_type;

SELECT customer_name, communication_type, MIN(DATEDIFF(C.communication_date, B.interaction_date)) AS min_response_time FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id JOIN communications C ON B.interaction_id = C.interaction_id GROUP BY customer_name, communication_type;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(B.interaction_date, (SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = A.customer_id))) AS days_since_last_interaction FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_type;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(COALESCE((SELECT MIN(communication_date) FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND interaction_id = B.interaction_id), B.interaction_date), B.interaction_date)) AS avg_email_response_time FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id JOIN communications C ON B.interaction_id = C.interaction_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT A.customer_name, B.interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM customers A JOIN interactions B ON A.customer_id = B.customer_id GROUP BY A.customer_name, B.interaction_type HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers
SELECT customer_id, address FROM Customers
SELECT * FROM Interactions
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Interactions
SELECT * FROM Communications
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM Communications
SELECT * FROM Queries
SELECT query_date, user_id FROM Queries
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email, address FROM Customers
SELECT interaction_type, notes FROM Interactions
SELECT communication_type, content FROM Communications
SELECT query_text, query_result FROM Queries
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers
SELECT interaction_type, notes FROM Interactions
SELECT communication_type, content FROM Communications
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.communication_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id WHERE com.customer_id = 2;
SELECT u.user_name, u.user_role, q.query_text FROM Users u INNER JOIN Queries q ON u.user_id = q.user_id WHERE q.user_id = 3;
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id WHERE com.customer_id IS NULL;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c RIGHT JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id IS NULL;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING COUNT(i.interaction_id) > 2;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id ORDER BY com.communication_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id ORDER BY i.interaction_date ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id OFFSET 2;
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT c.customer_name, com.communication_type, com.content FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Communications com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id WHERE com.communication_type IN ('Email', 'SMS');
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.notes LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT u.user_name, u.user_id, COUNT(q.query_id) AS total_queries FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Queries q ON u.user_id = q.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT communication_date, communication_details FROM communications WHERE communication_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM orders WHERE order_quantity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM communications JOIN orders ON communications.communication_id = orders.order_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(product_price * order_quantity) AS total_order_value FROM customers JOIN orders USING (customer_id) JOIN products USING (product_id) GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers JOIN interactions USING (customer_id) GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_category, AVG(product_price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY product_category;

SELECT customer_name, email, communication_details FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN communications ON orders.order_id = communications.communication_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity_ordered FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE order_quantity > 5;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS distinct_products_ordered FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) > 2;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(order_date) AS last_order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(order_quantity) AS avg_order_quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, communication_date, communication_type, communication_details FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, communication_type, communication_details FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, communication_date, communication_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id LEFT JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(product_price * order_quantity) AS total_order_value FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, product_category, AVG(product_price) AS avg_price_per_category FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_name, product_category;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, COUNT(communication_id) AS total_communications FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN communications ON interactions.interaction_id = communications.interaction_id GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_date;

SELECT customer_name, MAX(product_price) AS most_expensive_product FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, AVG(order_quantity) AS avg_order_quantity FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, interaction_date;
